column5: Hi, I'm sure there is going to be the 3rd Annual Hamilton Swap........does anyone have info on the date and venue. Usually the 3rd weekend in April if I remember correctly.  Thanks,  Mark
I went to last years,and hope to attend again this year. Some great deals.
Being from Hamilton i'd like the info also. Thanks.
An added bonus is, beers at 10,with a member. LOL
Please keep us updated.  I'm in Fonthill.

Third or fourth Saturday in April would be awesome I wanted to go each year past but was busy I'm free both weekends I hope it goes then.  I would also get a table I have lots of lures to swap.  It Sounds like a great time was had the last two times I'm looking forward to it.

I know there were a few members that had tables last year. Jose,Hirk and Bruce and Chris. I need more salsa that Bruce makes.  Fishfarmer might know the dates as well.  I believe it,s the Hamilton Bass club that puts it on. I think.
. I need more salsa that Bruce makes.  I hope I still have some left by then.
Have not gotten a date, yet for the Hamilton swap. Still asking around.  The Niagara Outdoor Show is on Sun, March 10th, Ft Erie Leisureplex
